TopicTitle: Can we add an option for choosing bigger font sizes for text?

Articles.Content: The text's font size are currently rather small. Can we add an option for choosing bigger font sizes for text?
I'd like that. Tiny text takes a lot of fun out of trying to play KSP on the big screen.
Yes yes yes. KSP is not friendly to those of us with less than perfect eyes.

I suspect that this isn't going to be easy to implement, since bigger font sizes require the corresponding graphical UI elements to be scaled up as well, and scaling images bigger almost always result in poorer quality.
